text: Amasung nakhoigi pukning adu hangdokpiduna mahakki mangal adu ujananaba eina Tengban Mapuda nijei. Madu mahakna nakhoibu koubibagi asha adu karino haiba nakhoina khangnanaba amadi mahakki asengba misingda mahakna wasakpiramba angakpa yaipha thoujal adu kayada marang kaibano haibadu nakhoina khangnanabani.
